short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get reminders with exercises to stretch during your workday.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gives you periodic reminders during your workday to get up and stretch. You determine the frequency of the reminders you'd like to get and you'll be presented with a new stretch to do each time. 

The new tab includes rotating photo backgrounds and a web search result by Microsoft Bing.

Permissions Requested
The Storage permission is requested and is used to store exercise data and images. 

More Information
Privacy Policy: https://deskstretchestab.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use:  https://deskstretchestab.com/terms-of-service/
Contact Us: https://deskstretchestab.com/contact/
Uninstall Info: https://deskstretchestab.com/uninstall/
